backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing rooms, message posting, retrieval, editing, and storage with blob support and basic validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a chat layout requirement to the RoomPage file with associated components and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of autogenerated short summaries describing key frontend files, features, and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark color schemes using OKLCH tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling theme provider, routing between lobby and room, and layout including header and conditional footer.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Dropdown theme selector component for switching between light, dark, and system modes.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Me: Provides a chat composer with text input, file attachment, clipboard file paste, upload progress, and message submission logic.
Renders a chat message with editing, deleting, replying, media display, optimistic status, and message actions.
frontend/src/features/chat/reactions/Rea: Displays emoji reactions on messages and allows users to add reactions via a popover.
frontend/src/features/chat/RoomPage.tsx: Chat room page fetching messages, validating rooms, handling loading/error states, and displaying message list with fixed layout and reply support.
frontend/src/features/chat/types/chatMes: Defines client-side chat message types including optimistic send status and retry payloads.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/display: Returns a safe display name for message senders based on nickname or fallback to Anonymous.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/downloa: Provides helpers to trigger file downloads and infer file extensions from MIME types.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/message: Maps backend or network errors to user-friendly chat error messages.
Implements stable sorting and merging of chat messages with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/features/lobby/EditNickname: Inline editor allowing users to update, clear, or cancel editing their nickname.
frontend/src/features/lobby/LobbyPage.ts: Handles nickname setup, room creation, room validation, and room joining for the lobby UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Manages a locally stored anonymous userId and nickname with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for rooms, messages, and chat mutations using the backend actor with polling and optimistic updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and chat bubble colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme colors from CSS variables, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, architecture notes, and known issues for the chat application.
